name: Supply Run (Li_Macc)
description:
Supply Run is a brutal tale about moral choices and survival set in a post apocalyptic world. In this story you play the role of a supply runner tasked with the very important duty of gathering food, water, medicine and equipment for your settlement. 

Throughout your journey in the overgrown wasteland you will be faced with many difficult scenarios. Each having many different outcomes that may or may not be beneficial for you. The choices you make in these situations will determine the outcome of your narrative and the survival of your settlement. 

Will you be ruthless and menacing or will you be kind and generous. To what extent will you go to reach your goal. 

Supply Run's narrative can end in many different ways so I encourage you to play it more then once to get the best experience.

Cover Image -  https://pixabay.com/en/apocalyptic-trees-forest-buildings-2147936/
